alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 6:10PM EDT until September 08 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Lowndes County in south central Georgia... Central Brooks County in south central Georgia... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 610 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Hahira, or 10 miles north of Quitman, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Valdosta, Hahira, Morven, Barney, I-75 At Exit 22, and I-75 At Exit 29. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
